sentences.en: " Oh, anybody can run a tick down that don't belong to them.
sentences.cn: “ 哦, 吃不到葡萄就说葡萄酸.

sentences.en: [as noun ticking off]he got a ticking off from the magistrate.
sentences.cn: 他受到地方法官的斥责。

sentences.en: Abdel felt free to tick him off for smoking too much.
sentences.cn: 阿卜杜勒动辄责骂他抽烟太凶。

sentences.en: Constant delays ticked me off.
sentences.cn: 反复地耽搁使我很生气

sentences.en: He sat listening to the tick of the grandfather clock.
sentences.cn: 他坐在那儿，听着落地式大摆钟嘀嗒作响。

sentences.en: He wanted to find out what made them tick.
sentences.cn: 他想搞清楚他们为什么会那样。

sentences.en: he was ticked off by Angela.
sentences.cn: 安吉拉责备了他。

sentences.en: I wound up the watch and listened to it tick.
sentences.cn: 我给表上紧发条，听着它嘀嗒作响。

sentences.en: I'll be back in a tick.
sentences.cn: 我马上就回来。

sentences.en: I’ll be with you in a tick (= soon ) .
sentences.cn: 我马上就来。

sentences.en: I'm interested in how people tick.
sentences.cn: 我对人们的所思所想很感兴趣。

sentences.en: It’ll only take two ticks.
sentences.cn: 只要一会儿。

sentences.en: Just hang on a tick, we may be able to help.
sentences.cn: 稍等一会儿，我们或许能帮上忙。

sentences.en: Just tick the box on your order form.
sentences.cn: 就在你订单的方框内打钩。

sentences.en: people are curious to know what makes British men tick.
sentences.cn: 人们很想知道英国人生活的动力何在。

sentences.en: Place a tick in the appropriate box.
sentences.cn: 在相应的方框里打钩。

sentences.en: Please tick this box if you do not wish to receive such mailings.
sentences.cn: 如果你不想收到此类邮件，请在这个方框里打钩。

sentences.en: Put a tick in the box if you agree with this statement.
sentences.cn: 如果你同意这种说法，就在方框内打一个钩。

sentences.en: The clock goes'tick - tock, tick - tock '.
sentences.cn: 时钟发出滴答滴答的声音.

sentences.en: The company produces chemicals that destroy ticks and mites.
sentences.cn: 该公司生产消灭壁虱和螨虫的化学品。

sentences.en: The old clock ticked noisily.
sentences.cn: 那只古老的钟大声地嘀嗒着。

sentences.en: The silence was broken only by the tick of the clock.
sentences.cn: 除了时钟的滴答声外,一片寂静.

sentences.en: The tick escaped from Tom, presently, and crossed the equator.
sentences.cn: 扁虱很快就从汤姆这边逃出去, 爬过了界线.

sentences.en: Tick bites can cause Lyme disease.
sentences.cn: 被蜱叮咬会引发莱姆病。

sentences.en: Tick it off in the box.
sentences.cn: 在方框里打钩。

sentences.en: Tick the description that best fits you.
sentences.cn: 给最符合你的描述打钩。

words.tran_cn: 滴答响的东西；自动收报机；钟表；断续器
坚质条纹棉布或亚麻布；（指钟表发出的）滴答响声

phrases.tran_cn: [口语]一会儿，一刹那间，一转眼间
(非正式)某人的行为（或思想）动机是，某人动机何在

trans.tran_cn: 钩号，蜱，壁虱，嘀嗒声，一会儿，赊账
trans.tran_en: A tick is a written mark like a V. It is used to show that something is correct or has been selected or dealt with.

trans.tran_cn: 发出嘀嗒声，打钩号，做出…举动
trans.tran_en: if a clock or watch ticks, it makes a short repeated sound
if a clock or watch ticks, it makes a short repeated sound
to mark a test, list of questions etc with a tick, in order to show that something is correct, to choose something etc
